item.title: Army identifies 4 soldiers killed in military helicopter crash in Washington state
item.description: The Army has released the names of four soldiers killed when the military helicopter they were on crashed near a base in Washington state

item.title: Caretaker killed by tiger at wildlife preserve in southeastern Oklahoma
item.description: An animal handler was killed by a tiger under his care at a preserve for big cats in southeastern Oklahoma

item.title: Suspect in New Hampshire country club shooting to appear in court
item.description: A man charged in a fatal shooting at a New Hampshire country club is set to make an initial court appearance Monday

item.title: Man representing himself against Trump plot plans to call just 3 witnesses
item.description: A man representing himself in federal court after being charged with trying to assassinate President Donald Trump at his Florida golf course last year...

item.title: 4.3 magnitude earthquake jolts San Francisco Bay Area, people report feeling shake
item.description: An earthquake with a magnitude of 4.3 has awakened a number of people in the San Francisco Bay Area with a sharp jolt
